Translations.Text: Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "en$et ep, ne$ sseo$et ep". Isellek it Oebbi, si tmes. Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i ugdud iumnen
Inna: "teddmem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Temeemmalem di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, ass n tnekra, kra degwen ad nekoen wiyav, kra ad xzun wiyav. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi usellak
Iumen it Lui. Inna: "nek, d iminig ar Mass iw. Ih, Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
N$at it s Iseaq akked Yaaqub. I tarwas, Nefka lambiyya, Tazmamt. Nefka yas taqviat is, di ddunit; u neppa, di laxeot, war ccekk, seg iaaoviyen
Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "ih, aql akwen la txedmem laao, ur ixdim yiwen, zik, deg imavalen
La teppeddum, ih, ar irgazen, tgezzmem abrid, txeddmem ayen icemten, deg igrawen nnwen". Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi nnan: "awi a$ d aaaqeb n Oebbi, ma telliv seg wid issawalen tidep
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi afus, mgal agdud ifessaden
